page.title: 02SCHOOLDAY IN GILMORTON
page.content: 7.30am:Put on school uniform. 8.00am:Had Corn Flakes. 8.10am:Packed school bag. 8.55am:Caught school bus after much pushing. 9.15am:Register in classroom.39 in our class.School assembly in hall,hymns,prayer,story. 9.30am:Maths lesson-fractions. 10.30am:playtime - skipping. 11.00am:English - study skills. 12 noon:Lunch in the hall.10 on my table.Beefburger,chips,melting moments 12.30pmPlayed Paddy 123,hide&seek game 1.20pm:Made folder for school trip to Scarborough in June. 3.25pm:Line up in playground for bus. 4.30pm:Watch television. 5.00pm:Play skipping. 7.00pm:Do maths homework. 8.00pm:Bath and bed.
